entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
